title: Study overestimating economic impact of climate change retracted, though central banks already used it
description: A pair of scientists who worked on the study cited “substantial” issues with the paper, which was originally published in Nature in April 2024.
content: The scientific journal Nature retracted an influential paper that overestimated the economic toll of climate change but not until after central banks around the world had used it to create risk manag… [+2876 chars]
